extraData: TARGET feywild:autumn_pixie ACTION use TIMES 9 USING minecraft:potato
name: Living Supplies: Potatoes
text: Hello dear! Let's make this place a nice a comfy home. /nAfter all we need to survive together now! /nSo would you be a darling and provide us with some extra g&food supplies? /nHmm how about a crate of firm g&potatoes?
